text:
StreetShares | DevOps Eng. | Washington, DC (Reston, VA) | Full-time, onsite, http://streetshares.com

StreetShares is a startup with ~30 employees focused on small business lending centered around the veteran community.

We are looking for a senior dev ops engineer to improve our pipeline from development to production. We have a small tech team (currently 6) and you will have control of our deployment.

It will involve:

    * docker

    * python

    * aws

    * Jenkins
You can apply online at https://streetshares.workable.com/

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to email Andrew at aahlers@streetshares.com
